title: Latest News from Science Magazine
description: Keyword search result for Alerts: News Weekly Headlines -- New results matching your keyword search query (updated daily).

items.title: Five things to know about NSF’s new rules on merit review
items.description: Fewer outsiders, less feedback, and an uncertain fate for a new science board report

items.title: Two ancient humans, including famed ‘Iceman,’ had cancer-causing virus
items.description: Findings from ancient DNA may shed light on HPV’s history in our species

items.title: Life in Europa’s ocean could feed on rocks’ radioactive decay
items.description: After series of bleak findings, theory sparks hope for alternative energy source within Jupiter’s intriguing moon

items.title: NIH official resigns after flap over risks of seasonal flu virus study
items.description: Agency may be expanding list of pathogens subject to dangerous “gain-of-function” regulations

items.title: Roots of milk drinking revealed by South Asian genomes
items.description: Natural selection was at work—but only in populations with no alternative to dairy

items.title: Replicas of the uterine lining reveal drugs that may boost pregnancy success
items.description: Three research teams have modeled how early embryos find a place to take root

items.title: Kennedy ‘deeply committed to ending animal experimentation’
items.description: HHS secretary vows to end U.S. monkey imports, push for retirement of research primates

items.title: This fish seems to use its bizarre skull like a drum
items.description: The rockhead poacher’s unusual cranial anatomy may help it communicate

items.title: Watch these raindrops turn into rolling ‘sandballs’
items.description: Discovery suggests raindrops can be up to 100 times more erosive than once thought

items.title: Sun’s gravitational lens could reveal alien planets’ surfaces
items.description: Bold concept calls for sending telescopes 10 times farther than Pluto
